games.Title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
games.Description: An open-world adventure game where players explore the vast kingdom of Hyrule to defeat Calamity Ganon.

games.Title: Elden Ring
games.Description: An action RPG set in a vast fantasy world created by George R.R. Martin and Hidetaka Miyazaki.

games.Title: Cyberpunk 2077
games.Description: An open-world RPG set in the dystopian Night City, where players assume the role of V, a mercenary.

games.Title: God of War Ragnar√∂k
games.Description: A continuation of Kratos' and Atreus' journey through the Norse realms, facing the end of the world.

games.Title: Hollow Knight
games.Description: An atmospheric 2D metroidvania where players explore the ancient and mysterious kingdom of Hallownest.
